attributes.action: Abolish all plastic bags and packaging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oil (which is running out) makes plastic and it ends up in landfill, or worse still, inside animals and people which causes sickness and death. Stop making plastic that is designed to be thrown away. What a waste of resources, money and life! Stop making plastic now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
